com.hellokaton.blade.server

接口 Server

  • 所有已知实现类:
    NettyServer

    public interface Server
    Blade web server
    作者:
    biezhi 2017/6/6

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void join()
      Join current server
      void start(Blade blade)
      Start blade application
      void stop()
      Stop current server
      void stopAndWait()
      Stop current, Will have been waiting for the service to stop

   throws Exception
